remarks.format: ## Remarks `DriveListBoxArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`DriveListBox`数组。The `DriveListBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `DriveListBox` array. 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件传递到其事件处理程序。The `Click` event passes an to its event handler. 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 但是，如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果双击控件时，控件不支持事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键事件按下列顺序发生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键和事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用属性示例的键击在运行时和使用或修改的常见击键的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不使控件能够接收键盘事件，中窗体的属性到事件处理方法`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
